description: collection of frames extracted from videos extracted from watched videos by the oriane admin app. Framees embeddings are created for this collection.

payload_indexes.description: deterministic uuid creatred from: platform + video_code + frame_number + frame_second
platform of the video, i.e. instagram, tiktok, youtube, etc.
unique code of the video by platform

payload_data.description: path to the frame image in oriane-frames/<platform>/<video_code>/<frame_number>_<frame_second>.png S3 bucket. TODO: change to CDN url once implemented
number of the frame extracted, starting from 1
